channel.title: Projects on Adrian G. Zucco
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Adrian G. Zucco

item.title: Copenhagen Health Complexity Center
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: Member of the Copenhagen Health Complexity Center at the Department of Public Health, University of Copenhagen.

item.title: DANLIFE (The DANish LIFE course cohort)
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: The DANish LIFE course cohort (DANLIFE) is a nationwide, register-based, life-course cohort that is based on comprehensive and continuously updated information on social adversity and major life events from the Danish registers.

item.title: Disease trajectories in the European Health Data Space (EHDS)
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: Use case to study longitudinal health trajectories - and in particular those leading to cardiometabolic diseases using machine learning.

item.title: The Young Sleep Program
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: Patterns, mechanisms, and dynamics underlying sleep health in young adults.
